notes.note:
Updated to NSS 3.36.4 from 3.36.1:

-  Connecting to a server that was recently upgraded to TLS 1.3 would result in a SSL_RX_MALFORMED_SERVER_HELLO error ([bug 1462303][0])
- Fix crash on macOS related to authentication tokens, e.g. PK11 or WebAuthn ([bug 1461731][1])

See release notes for NSS [3.36.2][2] and [3.36.4][3]

[0]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/1462303
[1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/1461731
[2]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Mozilla/Projects/NSS/NSS_3.36.2_release_notes
[3]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Mozilla/Projects/NSS/NSS_3.36.4_release_notes

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.1
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
title: Firefox for Android 60.0.2 Release
